title: Sound Motions Volume 1
description: WAS $24.99 NOW ONLY $15.00 ! 10 track asset pack with high quality arrangements for game production.
longDescription:
Sound Motion's Volume I Track Listing

  • Time Is Now ( Emotional Piano Driven Cue )
  • Devils Tunnel ( String & Percussion Tension driven style cue with piano textures )
  • Dark Forests ( String & Percussion Tension driven style cue with ambient jungle/city vibe )
  • Galaxy 2.0 ( Percussion & Piano driven cue with cosmic synth textures )
  • City Of Bats ( Dark Synth driven cue with piano and percussion elements )
  • Finals Theme ( A beautifully crafted piano/String theme perfect for credit or title screens )
  • Los Angeles 2039 ( A dark city scape string driven tension style cue perfect for character title screens or home menu screens )
  • Enders Theme ( An emotionally piano driven theme perfect for cinematic videos character references or main theme )
  • The Rising ( Synth Guitar driven style tension cue perfect for level design, character screens or menu style music )
  • Cybernetic ( Synth driven cue with percussion elements ideal for menu screen music or character references)


LISTEN HERE : https://soundcloud.com/jordan-caygill/sound-motions-volume-1/s-IN0tGapg8fY
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  10 High Quality Music Arrangements
  •  High Quality Sounds
  •  Various Compositions in different styles ranging from Dark contexts to Emotional Uplifting passages
  • Not Available in (MP3) Unreal Engine Store Asset ONLY ( No other File Format download other than what is provided by the Unreal Store. ( See Audio Specs below )

Number of Audio Wavs: 10

Number of Audio Cues: 10

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 25 minutes 52 Seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

Supported Development Engine: 4.25

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
